mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.patientId as "patientId", b.patientName as "patientName", a.account as "account", a.type as "type", a.userId as "userId", c.user_name as "userName", a.costTime as "costTime" from cost a LEFT JOIN patient b ON a.patientId = b.patientId LEFT JOIN `user` c ON c.user_id = a.userId where 1=1 and if(#{patientId} is null,0=0,a.patientId = #{patientId}) and if(#{patientName} is null,0=0,b.patientName like CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')) and if(#{startTime} is null,0=0,a.costTime >= #{startTime}) and if(#{endTime} is null,0=0,a.costTime <= #{endTime}) order by a.patientId,a.costTime
select patientId as "patientId", (select sum(drugPrice*drugCount) from grantdrug where patientId = #{patientId}) as "account" from grantdrug where patientId=#{patientId} GROUP BY patientId

select patientId as "patientId", (select sum(a.count * b.drugPrice) from withdrawal a LEFT JOIN grantdrug b on a.drugsId = b.drugId where a.patientId = #{patientId}) as "account" from withdrawal c where c.patientId = #{patientId} group by c.patientId
select patientId as "patientId", (select sum(account) from cost where patientId = #{patientId}) as "account" from cost where patientId = #{patientId} group by patientId
select a.updateTime as "updateTime", b.price as "price", b.name as "wardTypeName" from wardupdate a LEFT JOIN category b ON a.roomType = b.type where a.patientId = #{patientId} order by a.updateTime
select sum(drugCount) from grantdrug where patientId=#{patientId} and drugId=#{drugId}
